page.title: 09THE MARKET HALL ELLESMERE
page.content: The market hall was completed in 1879.At first it was used as a market but now it is used for lots of different things like sports.Some of these sports are,five a side football, badminton and table tennis.The market hall itself is quite remarkable for its time.There are stone pillars by the main gate.The sports council are hoping to put new lighting and toilets in the market hall.The window frames are made of sandstone.The market hall is open on Tuesday for the market and Tuesday night there is an open games session,addmision being 30p.On Wednesday night it is used for poeple wanting to book a game. Thursday it is used for the BMX club and Friday is the market.
